ingredients.text: 4 lbs pork butt or other well marbled cut of pork cut into large chunks

255.name: Pistachio-Crusted Pork Chops - Pork Chops Recipes

295.name: Pork Roast with Apples and Sage

ingredients.text: ½ tsp. Freshly ground black pepper
1 jar pork gravy or bistro au jus (we used Heinz)
1 whole rind from a pork shoulder or belly (about 1 1/2 pounds), cut in to 1/5 inch slices

350g/12oz pork shoulder, flesh cut into 2.5cm/1in cubes
